internetkaufhaus.services

Class ConcreteMailService

  • java.lang.Object
    • internetkaufhaus.services.ConcreteMailService

  • @Service(value="mailService")
public class ConcreteMailService
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the ConcreteMailService class. It is responsible for sending mails via a connected mail provider.
    Author:
    heiner

      Instantiates a new concrete mail service.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMail

        public boolean sendMail(java.lang.String sendTo,
                        java.lang.String text,
                        java.lang.String from,
                        java.lang.String subject)
        The sendMail method will send a mail with the given mail attributes like the destination address or content.
        Parameters:
        sendTo - email destination address
        text - email text content
        from - sender name
        subject - email subject
        Returns:
        true if mail sending was successful
        Throws:
        org.springframework.mail.MailException - the mail exception
